ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Creating a portable, Linux-powered handheld computer for exploring hardware, software, and the Linux kernel.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Raspberry Pi CM5 compatibility â€¢ Blackberry keyboard integration â€¢ 4" 720x720 TFT touch display â€¢ 2242 NVME slot for SSD or AI accelerator â€¢ Dual speakers via Bluetooth
ðŸ“– Summary: The HackberryPi_CM5 project is about creating an ultra-portable, handheld Linux device powered by the Raspberry Pi CM5. It reuses Blackberry phone keyboards and aims to provide users with a deeper understanding of Linux and hardware/software architecture.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ soundscope | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Analyzing audio files and microphone input in the terminal for frequency distribution, amplitude over time, and loudness.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Audio file and microphone input analysis â€¢ FFT Spectrum visualization â€¢ Waveform display â€¢ LUFS metering and True Peak measurement
ðŸ“– Summary: Soundscope is a cross-platform command-line tool written in Rust for analyzing audio files and microphone input. It provides real-time analysis, including FFT spectrum visualization, waveform display, and LUFS metering, making it a comprehensive audio analysis solution for the terminal.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ youtube-smart-speed | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automatically adjusting YouTube playback speed based on audio analysis to optimize viewing experience.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Intelligent speed control â€¢ Adaptive acceleration â€¢ Controlled deceleration â€¢ Machine learning â€¢ Manual speed control
ðŸ“– Summary: The YouTube Smart Speed extension intelligently adjusts YouTube playback speed based on real-time audio analysis using AI. It speeds up during silence and slows down during speech, with user-configurable parameters and a machine learning component that adapts to usage patterns. The extension provides a seamless way to optimize YouTube viewing by automatically adjusting the playback speed to match the content.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ answergit | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Analyzing and understanding Git repositories using AI.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ AI-Powered Analysis using Google's Gemini AI â€¢ Smart File Explorer for easy navigation â€¢ Interactive Chat for asking questions about the codebase â€¢ Modern UI with dark-mode interface built with TailwindCSS â€¢ Real-time Updates for instant responses
ðŸ“– Summary: AnswerGit is an AI-powered platform designed to analyze Git repositories and provide intelligent insights about the code. It leverages Google's Gemini AI to offer detailed explanations, summaries of Git commands and workflows, and insights into code structure, making it easier to understand and interact with code repositories.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ arch-cleaner | Shell
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating system maintenance and cleanup on Arch Linux systems.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ System updates (standard and aggressive) â€¢ Removal of orphaned & unused packages â€¢ Pacman cache cleaning â€¢ Journal log cleaning â€¢ Temporary file removal
ðŸ“– Summary: Arch-Cleaner is a bash script designed for Arch Linux systems to automate routine maintenance and cleanup tasks. It provides features such as system updates, removal of orphaned packages, cleaning the pacman cache and journal logs, and temporary file removal, aiming to keep the system clean and optimized.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ PyMax | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating tasks and interactions within the Max Messenger platform using a Python-based userbot.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Asynchronous API wrapper â€¢ Message sending, editing, and deletion â€¢ Chat and channel management â€¢ Message history retrieval â€¢ Login by phone number
ðŸ“– Summary: PyMax is an asynchronous Python wrapper for the Max Messenger API, designed for userbot automation. It provides an interface for sending messages, managing chats, and accessing message history via WebSocket, enabling developers to automate tasks within the Max messaging platform.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ YTSage | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Downloading YouTube videos, extracting audio, and fetching subtitles with a user-friendly interface and advanced features.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Clean PySide6 interface â€¢ Video downloading in any quality â€¢ Audio extraction â€¢ Subtitle fetching â€¢ SponsorBlock integration
ðŸ“– Summary: YTSage is a modern, user-friendly YouTube downloader built with Python and PySide6. It leverages yt-dlp for reliable video downloading, audio extraction, subtitle fetching, and includes advanced features like SponsorBlock integration and playlist support, offering a seamless experience for users seeking a powerful yet simple downloading solution.
